website_summaries.verdict: Thanks to its unique, reliable Wi-Fi-based connection methodology, the HP Wi-Fi Mobile Mouse is easy to recommend to mobile Windows 7 PC users who need more available USB ports.
pros: By using your wireless receiver to connect to your PC, the HP Wi-Fi Mobile Mouse frees up USB ports for connectivity-starved travelers
cons: The mouse won't work without Windows 7, and it will be unreliable if you don't have a Windows 7-certified wireless adapter

product_meta.title: HP WiFi Mouse
product_meta.description:
HP WI-FI Mobile Mouse

FROM THE MANUFACTURER

Introducing the HP Wi-Fi Mobile Mouse, which lets you click and scroll without wires or a USB adapter. This wireless mouse connects easily to computers with a Genuine Windows 7 operating system and built-in Wi-Fi. With one-time pairing, start using this mouse quickly. The laser sensor works on most surfaces and you can create application shortcuts using five programmable buttons.


IDEAL FOR



Clicking and scrolling with total freedom. The HP Wi-Fi Mobile Mouse works without a USB adapter, so you can free up your computer’s USB ports for other devices. Just make sure your laptop or desktop has Genuine Windows 7 and built-in Wi-Fi. This wireless mouse has a symmetric sculpted design and rubber sides that make it easy to use with either hand. You can also use the convenient 4-way tilt smooth scroll wheel to navigate up, down, left and right quickly. Plus, save battery power with sleep mode and the on/off button. When you want to use your mouse again, simply press the “Connect” button on the bottom.
